stimulusHtml: Which of the following twentieth-century processes contributed most directly to the adoption of the system of cultural values to which Banksy alludes in Image 1 ?

features.html:
Image 1

BRITISH GRAFFITI ARTIST BANKSY, SALE ENDS TODAY, PAINTING, CIRCA 2010

Rebecca Sapp / Contributor

Image 2

BRITISH GRAFFITI ARTIST BANKSY, I HATE MONDAYS, PAINTING, CIRCA 2010

Banksy, I Hate Mondays, 2009

choicesHtml: The expansion of European empires led to the expansion of market economies worldwide.
Greater industrial productivity and new technologies led to increased availability of consumer goods.
Cold War rivalries led to ideological and economic competition between the Soviet Union and the United States.
The continued volatility of economic cycles led many governments to enact social welfare legislation for their citizens.
